com.apw.gpu

Class MonoToRGBKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aparapi.Kernel
      • com.apw.gpu.MonoToRGBKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MonoToRGBKernel
extends com.aparapi.Kernel
    The MonoToRGBKernel subclass describes a Kernel that creates a raw rgb pixel array from a monochromatic bayer rgb byte array
